page.title: 04SELBY THE RAILWAYS
page.content: SELBY STATION IS SITUATED ON THE MAIN LEEDS TO HULL LINE AND HAS AN EXCELLENT SERVICE TO YORK, LEEDS, HULL,AND DONCASTER.UNTIL THE SELBY COALFIELD ARRIVED SELBY STATION WAS ON THE MAIN LINE FROM LONDON TO SCOTLAND. THE COALBOARD PAID BRITISH RAIL TO DIVERT THE MAIN LINE FOUR MILES TO THE WEST OF THE TOWN BECAUSE THE LAND UNDER THE OLD LINE WOULD SINK MAKING THE TRAINS GO SLOWLY.SELBY LOST ITS THROUGH LONDON SERVICE BUT MOST TRAINS DID NOT STOP ANYWAY.PEOPLE GOING TO LONDON HAVE TO CHANGE AT DONCASTER. MANY MERRY-GO-ROUND TRAINS FROM THE PITS TO THE POWER STATION PASS THROUGH THE TOWN.A LOT OF PEOPLE COMPLAIN THAT THERE IS A LOT VIBRATION WHICH SHAKES THINGS OFF THEIR TABLES BECAUSE THE TRAINS ARE SO HEAVY.
